item.description:
Come join local permaculture designer and educator Lisa Fernandes for a special 2-hour workshop and fund raiser at Jordan's Farm in Cape Elizabeth. In a permaculture system, fall is an excellent time to build your no-dig garden beds for next year's planting! Come learn this technique which could revolutionize the way you garden...


  • Build garden beds any size or shape using materials from your home or neighborhood.
  • Control weeds and build more fertile soil.
  • Stop digging & tilling or create gardens where digging & tilling are not possible.
  • Turn lawn or weedy areas into productive gardens.


Suggested donation of $10 to $15 supports Lisa's participation in the Slow Food Terra Madre conference in Torino, Italy this October.

Please bring a notebook, folding chair and - if desired - a camera as there will be a hands-on component.

Workshop flier: http://files.meetup.c...

Sponsored by Portland Maine Permaculture, Wm H Jordan Farm and the Cape Farm Alliance.

group.name: Portland Maine Permaculture & The Resilience Hub

item.name: No-Dig, Weed-Free Garden Beds the Permaculture Way
